alert.note: Alert for Lee; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lee and central Sumter Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Mulberry to near South Sumter. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, South Sumter, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Mayesville, Cane Savannah, Ashwood, Oswego, Dalzell, Brogdon, Lakewood, Privateer, East Sumter, St. Charles, Cherryvale, Woodrow, and Wedgewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
